Decision_Statement: Require MFA for all users and eliminate shared accounts to reduce unauthorized access risk
Assign owners to each Shared Drive and execute quarterly access reviews to reduce permission creep
Restrict external link sharing defaults and audit existing links to reduce accidental exposure
Encrypt loaner laptops and implement sign-out/custody logging to reduce impact of loss/theft
Prohibit unapproved USB drives and provide encrypted alternatives to eliminate untracked data movement
Reduce admin roles to minimum and review privileges quarterly to reduce privileged access risk
Strengthen Wi-Fi credentials and segment guest access to reduce unauthorized network entry
Run quarterly inventory audits and reconcile discrepancies to improve accountability and response readiness
